register(string,address,address,address,.details: A name is unique within the Aragon DAO framework and can get stored here

params.dao: The address of the DAO contract
params.name: The name of the DAO

register(string,address,address,address,.notice: Registers a DAO by his name

userdoc.notice: This contract provides the possiblity to register a DAO by a unique name.
